basics.name: Yiyu Wang (Ian)
basics.summary: Dual-degree undergraduate in Mechanical Engineering (SJTU) and Computer Science (UMich). Research interests in multi-robot systems, heuristic search, and motion planning.

work.company: RAP Lab, Shanghai Jiao Tong University
work.summary: Designed a heuristic algorithm for CVRPTW and compared with baselines. Developed a C++ solver for heterogeneous multi-robot path planning. Paper submitted to MRS 2025.

publications.name: HEHA: Hierarchical Planning for Heterogeneous Multi-Robot Exploration of Unknown Environments
publications.summary: Designed, implemented (C++) and evaluated global heuristic planning algorithms for heterogeneous multi-robot exploration. Co-authored paper and conducted real-robot experiments.

teaching.institution: Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Joint Institute
teaching.description: Assisted with lab instruction, grading, and answering student questions for an undergraduate mechanics course.

references.name: Prof. Zhongqiang Ren
